Packages that use net.padlocksoftware.padlock.license

Classes in net.padlocksoftware.padlock.license used by net.padlocksoftware.padlock.license
ImportException
          This exception is thrown when a license import operation fails.
License
          Instances of the License interface are the primary means of customizing licenses.
LicenseSigner
          Public factory class for signing Licenses.
LicenseTest
          A LicenseTest instance is the fundamental result unit of the Padlock validation process.
TestResult
          The TestResult class is a wrapper for a LicenseTest instance and a simple boolean flag indicating whether the test passed or failed.
 

Classes in net.padlocksoftware.padlock.license used by net.padlocksoftware.padlock.validator
License
          Instances of the License interface are the primary means of customizing licenses.
LicenseState
          The LicenseState class represents the results of a Validation attempt on a license.
TestResult
          The TestResult class is a wrapper for a LicenseTest instance and a simple boolean flag indicating whether the test passed or failed.
